results.title: Using them safely
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Drugs and Medicines”
Safely using either prescription or non-prescription drugs and medicines requires reading the label and following the directions, storing them in a safe place and avoiding leftover medicine

results.title: Using the Verifax printer type 1
results.brief_description: The use and maintenance of the Manual Verifax Printer Type 1. This visual “manual” highlights the simplicity of using a machine able to make multiple copies of a designated document. The simplistic approach to this manual is both economical and approachable to printing.

results.title: Using the scientific method
results.brief_description: Presents the scientific method in the context of an every-day problem. Begins with the definition of the problem and shows the steps in the procedure through collection of information, formation of a hypothesis, and the experimental testing of the hypothesis to the retesting of the results obtained. The attitudes so necessary for successful work with the scientific method, objectivity and precision are also stressed.

results.title: Using the land
results.creator_credit: Jan Punch, Judith Adamson and Film Australia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Film Australia’s Australia”.
Six themes: OWNING THE LAND, CHANGING THE LAND, FARMING THE LAND, MINING THE LAND, SETTLING THE LAND and APPRECIATING THE LAND. ‘USING THE LAND’ helps to provide answers to four major questions: What is the importance of the land to Australians? How have Australians used the land over time? What are the effects of its usage? What needs to be done to protect and conserve the environment as a sustainable resource for the future? Presented by Annette Shun Wah.

results.title: Using small equipment in movement education (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Glenn Kirchner and Burbank Audio Visual
results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Movement education”
Illustrates a variety of equipment including hoops, beanbags, and individual ropes that can be used in movement education. Shows where and how to use the equipment. Quality and variety of movement, partner work and a card system for movement education are discussed.

results.title: Using our rivers
results.brief_description: Some of the New Zealand rivers and the ways in which they serve the interests of the country. There is water transport on the Wanganui River taking the Northland coal supply to Whangarei by scows. In the rivers of the West Coast, whitebait is harvested, and in the highlands the Cobb River serves a mountain power station.

results.title: Using our language: modifiers
results.brief_description: Familiar proverbs depicted in animation show how we use adjectives and adverbs to modify, intensify or change the meanings of words, phrases and clauses as modifiers is related to levels of modification and to good writing.
